attributes.action: Make dog attacks on cats a specific criminal offence
attributes.additional_details:
As it stands there isn't a specific law to protect cats from dogs. It is an offence to allow a dog to be dangerously out of control, but we want a specific offence for when a dog attacks a cat.

My cat has been attacked several times, but no action has been taken against the owner of the dog. I believe creating a specific criminal offence would make the police and prosecutors take these attacks more seriously.
attributes.background: We want the Government to increase accountability of dog owners for when their dogs attack cats.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
